summary: Completed testing of F1 Fast Lap Challenge new features: Admin Setup Flow, Admin Login, Design Dialog Website Tab, Badge Removal, and Dynamic Tab Title. All features working correctly.
passed_tests: Admin Setup Flow - Setup form appears when no admin exists with fields: Username, Email (optional), Password, Confirm Password
Admin Setup - Successfully creates admin account and redirects to dashboard
Admin Login - Login with admin/admin credentials works correctly
Design Dialog - Has 5 tabs: Titel, Farben, Schriften, Hintergrund, Website
Website Tab - Tab-Titel (Browser) input field present and functional
Website Tab - Favicon URL input field present and functional
Badge Removed - No 'Made with Emergent' badge on public page
Badge Removed - No emergent-related elements found on page
Dynamic Tab Title - Browser tab title updates based on design settings
Backend API - /api/design endpoint returns site_title, favicon_url, show_badge
Backend API - /api/admin/design PUT updates website settings correctly
Backend API - All 15 pytest tests passed (100% success rate)
seed_data_creation: Admin account recreated with admin/admin credentials
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features are working: 1) Admin Setup Flow shows setup form when no admin exists, 2) Admin Login works with admin/admin, 3) Design Dialog has Website Tab with Tab-Titel and Favicon URL settings, 4) Badge has been removed from index.html, 5) Dynamic tab title changes based on design settings. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_f1_features.py cover all API endpoints.
